attributes.action: make sure that the relivent authorities make sure that all road signs can be seen clearly by vehicle drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As I have travel around the country, I have been staggered by the vast number of road signs that are obscuered by trees, bushs or other foliage, which makes it vertually impossible to see them in adiquate time. The hardest to see are speed signs, making it hard to know what the correct speed limit is.

Also many directions signs are also obscured, often you can only see them, when you are in fact passing them, which means that you can often miss your turning.
